content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Max Müller from Germany. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Magdeburg. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Max Müller from Germany

content: Hello Max, it's a pleasure to meet you. I'm sure you'll find this apartment to be a perfect fit for your needs. How much were you thinking of offering for the monthly rent?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Well, I saw that the apartment is in the city center and it's newly built. But it's unfurnished and has only one bedroom. So, I was thinking of renting it for 400 euros per month.
name: Max Müller from Germany

content: I'm sorry, but that's much lower than my expectations. The location and quality of this apartment justify a higher price. How about we start at 550 euros per month? We can discuss any additional perks or concessions that might make the apartment more attractive to you.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Well, the apartment is indeed in a great location and has a modern design. But I'm a student, so I have to consider my budget carefully. I could go up to 450 euros per month for this apartment.
name: Max Müller from Germany

content: I understand that you're a student and might have a tight budget. However, the demand for such a centrally located apartment is high. I'm willing to throw in a free parking spot if you're willing to meet me at 500 euros per month. What do you say?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: That's a good deal, especially with the parking spot included. But I still cannot afford 500 euros per month. I could go up to 480 euros per month. That's the highest I can afford for this apartment.
name: Max Müller from Germany

content: I'm sorry, but 480 euros is still below my asking price. Let's compromise. How about 490 euros per month, and I'll waive the first month's deposit? This is the best I can offer. What do you think?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: That sounds like a fair deal. I agree to the price of 490 euros per month!
name: Max Müller from Germany

content: I agree to the price of 490 euros per month! Let's proceed with the paperwork. Is there anything else I can assist you with?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Thank you, Mister Schmidt. That's all for now. I'm looking forward to moving into the apartment.
name: Max Müller from Germany

content: You're welcome, Max! I'm glad we could reach an agreement. If you have any further questions or need assistance with anything regarding the apartment, feel free to contact me. Enjoy your new home!
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany
